title: Hello! I am a class 10th student and I have difficulty in scoring good marks in science. Can anyone suggest how to study it? - Quora

response.answer_text: its not a very hard task. I scored 95 in my science exam. you have to just be thorough with the NCERT text book this is sufficient to score even 100 marks.you have to revise the book at least 3 times.this can be easily achieved if u don't go behind any reference book . try to make NCERT your bible and I can practically guarantee you an exceptional score in your science board exam
